sections.heading: Release bondNo property seized under any order, judgment, writ, mandate, or process of a court may be released from seizure under a release or forthcoming bond unless it is executed by:(1) A surety company licensed to do business in this state; or(2) An individual surety, and has been approved by th
sections.text: Release bondNo property seized under any order, judgment, writ, mandate, or process of a court may be released from seizure under a release or forthcoming bond unless it is executed by:(1) A surety company licensed to do business in this state; or(2) An individual surety, and has been approved by the sheriff after the latter has satisfied himself of the solvency of the surety.Articles 5121 through 5126 apply to a release or forthcoming bond.

sections.heading: 5121 through 5126 apply to a release or forthcoming bond.
sections.text: 5121 through 5126 apply to a release or forthcoming bond.
